title: Fire Magic
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

The **Fire Magic** school determines how easily you can manipulate fire.

Fire magic focuses almost single-mindedly on dealing direct damage to enemies; most fire spells are also [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"), though a few spells offer slightly more subtlety. Practitioners should have no difficulty due to a lack of firepower, whether they be single targets or large groups. Damage from Fire Magic is generally reduced by [fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance").

## Tips & Tricks

- Most Fire spells aren't weaker against foes standing in [water](/Water "Water") - they're stronger. When fiery beams pass over water, they create [steam](/Steam "Steam") clouds, which deal extra damage. Steam can also be used to block [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). (The exception is [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"), which gets extinguished by water.)
